statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET from_address = 'sender@example.com', to_address = 'receiver@example.com' WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 2000.50, timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '4925b783-8a6b-4c21-b0c2-f7b31867b4e1';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET to_address = 'John Doe', amount = 5000.00 WHERE transaction_hash = '0x5bc911b23bb540c6a77fd19c3667887c';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 15.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE block_verifications SET verifier_address = '0x98765' , verified_at = '2022-09-30 15:30:00' WHERE verification_id = 54321;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, receiver_address = '0x123456789abc' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE block_verifications SET verified_at = '2021-10-15 12:00:00', verifier_address = '0x987654321cba' WHERE verification_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_verification SET verification_status = true , verification_timestamp= '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE verification_id = 2001;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 5000.25, to_address = '0x1234abcd' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE transaction_verification SET verification_status = true, verifier = 'John Doe' WHERE verification_id = 201;
UPDATE transactions SET sender_address = '123 Main St' WHERE transaction_id = 'abcdef123456'
UPDATE blocks SET timestamp = now(), previous_hash = 'prevhash123' WHERE block_id = 10
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE sender_address = '0x24F7D3E19F27A1A3' AND receiver_address = '0x1B5BF82D60A01F3' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
UPDATE blocks SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE hash = '0x8E4AC1FDB4F97DB2CE13B9B4FE3FD2' AND previous_hash = '0x07F5ACDD3EFF6D2F4615B15AFFE0'
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500.00, from_address = '0x123456789', timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_verification SET verified = true, verification_time = '2022-01-02 10:30:00' WHERE verification_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, timestamp = '2022-01-21 14:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '7c2dcd09-614b-4c11-a1a3-70d0e17b93d1';
UPDATE transaction_audit SET audit_status = 'verified', audit_timestamp = '2022-01-22 10:45:00' WHERE audit_id = 5;
